targets.query:
from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power_monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Aggregate")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power_monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Dishwasher" or r["_field"] == "Aggregate" or r["_field"] == "TumbleDryer" or r["_field"] == "WashingMachine")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Power_monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Aggregate")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._time) }))

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power_monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Dishwasher")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "Dishwasher")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "prob")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "Dishwasher")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power_monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "WashingMachine")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "WashingMachine")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "prob")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "WashingMachine")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power_monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "TumbleDryer")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "TumbleDryer")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "prob")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "TumbleDryer")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: PREDICTIONS AND ACTUAL APPLIANCE'S USE â€“ PARTIAL FIT

targets.query:
from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Power_monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Dishwasher")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_state_helped")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "Dishwasher")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
